Commands.Rapid Bullets: 2-hit ranged BRV attack  High turn rate  Self: 3 turns MAX BRV Up II
Commands.Rapid Bullets+: Ranged BRV attack + HP attack.  Self: 3 turns MAX BRV Up II.  High turn rate
Commands.Reload: Resets use count of other abilities  Increases BRV based on ATK  Self: 6 turns Trigger-Happy  Rapid Bullets becomes Rapid Bullets+ (ranged BRV attack + HP attack) while Trigger-Happy active

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV
Artifacts.Mighty Rapid Bullets: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Rapid Bullets by 10%
Artifacts.Bravery Reload: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Reload

Passives.Ability Attack High: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt when using abilities continuously (including enhanced BRV/HP Attack)
Passives.Rapid Bullets Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Rapid Bullets ,  Rapid Bullets+
Passives.Critical Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after dealing a critical hit
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts
Passives.Reload BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using  Reload
Passives.Leg Shot: Grants a low probability of inflicting  Small Speed Down  for 3 turns after using  BRV Attack
Passives.Reload Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using  Reload
Passives.Never Give Up: Prevents BREAK status if BRV is at least 50% of Max BRVBRV value remains at 1
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Rapid Bullets Extension: Rapid Bullets use count +2When using Rapid Bullets, Rapid Bullets+:   BRV attack hit count increased by 1; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage   Granted effects' duration +2
Passives.Last Boost: Moderately raises MAX BRV if HP is MAX at start of last wave
Passives.Reload Extension: When using Reload:   Moderate boost to BRV granted based on ATK   Trigger-Happy duration +6   Triggers additional HP attack after useWhile Trigger-Happy active:   BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (cumulatively powerful 2-hit ranged BRV attack)

Weapons.Judgment CP: 15: When using  Rapid Bullets ,  Rapid Bullets+ :- Raises BRV potency- Grants  Small Attack Up  for 1 turn
Weapons.Outsider CP: 35: Reload  use +1When using  Reload :- Raises the BRV Gain based on Attack- Lowers Action Delay- Improves the effects of  Trigger Happy  and extends its duration
